Title: An informatics course on applied clinical information systems.
Abstract: In the ongoing evaluation of our informatics curricula, feedback from alumni indicated a need for a more practically oriented course in clinical systems. This poster presents our experience developing and teaching such a course that seeks to provide students with the principles, concepts and skills needed to plan, implement, and maintain clinical systems.

Authors.Affiliation: Department of Biomedical Informatics,Columbia University, New York, NY, USA.

Journal: AMIA ... Annual Symposium proceedings. AMIA Symposium
